website_summaries.verdict: You'll get fantastic sound out of this speaker, especially if you like to play your music loud.
pros: Includes optical, RCA, and 3.5 millimeter cables and can also connects to Bluetooth-enabled devices
Bass and treble can be adjusted with dials on the speaker
Superb sound quality, especially at higher volumes
cons: The sound quality gets a little muddy at lower volumes and the Bluetooth connection can have some issues

customer_reviews.title: You'd be missing out
customer_reviews.text: If you like loud crystal clear music this is your product in a convenient size. I'm have an eclectic taste in music and this speaker adapts so I can throw the treble up and hear frank sinatras voice like I was there to dubstep drops so deep I have to turn the base down to avoid heart rattles. If I could link these easily for multi room use I would have 5 easily. Impossible without integrating them to your home network.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with speakers blown
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive and use this system, it arrived and to my surprise it wasn't working, after messing with it for 20 minutes, I realized that I could faintly hear my music playing, the speakers were blown. LOVLEY. Im going to return and try another, hopefully the system will live up to Marshalls reputation.
customer_reviews.author: Tom-Tom

customer_reviews.title: Best sound quality
customer_reviews.text: If you want the best sound quality speaker to pair with a Google Mini or Sonos, this likely is it. I enjoy hi fidelity and am used to the sound of B&W speakers. But it’s not easy to stream Spotify etc. using Google Assistant or Sonos to a hi-fi audio system. Thank you, Marshall. The sound easily beats all the wireless speaker competition I checked out. With two 5” woofers and two 1” tweeters, the sound is amazing. And the Bluetooth setup is incredibly easy. For true audiophiles, it also offers an optical input. Just wow. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: SoulM8z

customer_reviews.title: COOLEST BLUETOOTH SPEAKER EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my favorite purchase in a long time. I love this thing. I looked at many other bluetooth speakers and none of them sound as good as this one AND it's beautiful to look at. As a musician, I can be a little overly critical sometimes of cheap gear but this speaker is extremely well built. Also, the RCA & optical inputs are a bonus. Now I can hook up my turntable to it as well and use it in my loft. I was so happy with this purchase I turned around and bought the Marshall Kilburn as well so I could take it with me when I travel.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Worth its weight in gold
customer_reviews.text: I dont write reviews. Ever. This thing sounds too good to not write a review & help someone on the fence about buying it. Buy it. I have a couple of Bose speakers, altho a bit smaller & more portable, this thing sounds amazing. Ive been playing music & recording music for over 30 years. Dont hesitate pulling the trigger if you're looking for something that sounds amazing & looks cool as hell to add for your house. It'd be even cooler if it had a handle on top to easily transport.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great appearance and loud! Sound just keeps getting better!
customer_reviews.text: Had trouble w the bluetooth initially w low output of sound, but unconnected the unit and replugged in and solved it. Careful if you use the 3.5mm cord with source. Source should be turned down at first, as it will be extremely loud output if both the source and speaker are turned up high, causing distortion. Great product. Phenomenal sound. I use this with an optical cord hooked to an apple tv, and watch outdoor movies, feels like I'm at a movie theatre with the quality of sound. Have also started using this in place of my outdoor def tech speakers, much better base.
customer_reviews.author: pete

customer_reviews.title: Classic Looks, Incredible Sound
customer_reviews.text: Sits in my living room. Love the retro look, doesn't look like the latest tech gadget that will be out of style in a year. This is timeless. And the simplicity of the controls is exactly what I want. Knobs ! Love them. And finally, the sound is excellent (for bluetooth), and even better for direct connection. Deep bass, crisp treble, room filling sound. Frankly, there isn't another system out there that would fit my decor or my style. Thanks !
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: Shake your foundations,
customer_reviews.text: This speaker will shake your foundations. Made in China , but made quite well. The Marshall Woburn, will make love to your ear drums with crystal clear sound. It’s not quite portable, but it is portable nonetheless. You don’t have to worry about lithium batteries dying out on you as this beast is plugged in. If you turn it up all the way, you’d best be wearing depends under garments, because you’ll pi’ss yourself. Yes, it’s that bloody loud.
customer_reviews.author: Earl

customer_reviews.title: Impresive bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with the "presence" of this speaker... looks like a quality guitar amplifier when OFF but really fills any room with sound when in use... connectivity is better than the new model (3.5mm, RCA, Toslink, Bluetooth). Also, the included 3.5mm aux-in cable is top quality and can be used with other devices. Haven't tested the optical connection but should work as expected. Excellent choice for playing music, but if you want to hook a TV, a soundbar with a subwoofer is a better option, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Rivadeneira Luis

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker for medium to large garden parties
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome speaker. I use it for inside and outside Latin dancing parties with about 30 or so people and only need to set the volume to 3-4 out of 10. So for your garden party one of these speakers is more than enough. The base is very strong and will make things shake around, particularly if you set the speaker up about 3 feet from a wall, so the sub woofers can reflect the sound towards the party. Forget the Bluetooth, the connection is weak (as with all Bluetooth products). Oh, and the speaker looks good and seems to be durable enough to survive a spilled drink or a little spray from rain.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Wooooooow! Pleasant surprise!
customer_reviews.text: When I saw the size of this speaker I wasn't expecting a plenty room filling sound....but I was really shocked from the first time I listen to it! Very very loud...bass are very present but balanced as well...not overwhelming at all, also you can equalize it by mucic genre on your taste. Mids and highs are crystal clear. And finally...design is incredible! It has that amazing vintage guitar amp look. Perfect for a high volume party at home.
customer_reviews.author: Antto Neves

customer_reviews.title: 1 Star
customer_reviews.text: Everything looked great for the first 3/4 month, sound, design, bluetooth... Then suddenly it just stopped working, can't turn it on anymore. Very angry...
customer_reviews.author: Milo

customer_reviews.title: Died after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. The sound and design and build are phenomenal. The speaker just stopped working. None of the 4 inputs work anymore. No sound comes out. I've reached out to Marshall for advise on repair. For a close to $500 device I'd expect it to work work many years. My 6 year old Jawbone speaker that I hate still works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Fletch

customer_reviews.title: All you need for your audio needs.
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker. This is my second speaker from Marshall. I bought the Killburn 2 yrs ago and loved it. I upgraded to a larger and more powerful speaker and I wasn’t disappointed. Easy setup/connection/ the bass is deep and all my friends always ask me if I’m bringing my speaker when we’re supposed to hang out. Truly you can be the DJ of the party with this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: PJHAM

customer_reviews.title: Better than i thought!
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of high end audio equipment but not much in the way of Bluetooth audio. I purchased the smallest marshall for travelling and now the biggest for home. First impression is this is amazing! Loud...my desk is vibrating and it's not on my desk. This is at a setting of 5. Sound quality...can't compete to my luxman hear but it's 5 percent of the price so it's pretty amazing.
customer_reviews.author: bopseek

customer_reviews.title: Love the speaker. Returning because body price fluctuations.
customer_reviews.text: I'm begining to be put off from Amazon all together and their constant price fluctuations. I paid 330 for this item only for a week later the price to drop almost $30. I'm returning. As much as I love the speaker I could just get something else cheaper and not have to deal with the headache. My money is valuable and I'm tired of Amazon taking advantage of the pricing here.
customer_reviews.author: x31513

customer_reviews.title: LOUD!!!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: this thing rocks! even at 5, it is LOUD!!!! I haven't gone about 5 yet because it's so loud I think i'll blow out the speaker. looks beautiful its blue tooth many different ways to connect Cons: it's heavy. (could use a carrying handle or strap) it's not reachable battery either (you need to be plugged in) Bottom line: I love it and would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Chris A

customer_reviews.title: Pure power!
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box. Connect replica guitar cable to iPhone. Metallica’s “One” at about 7. Sounds like they are in the room with me! Bass is SO strong. Great highs and mids. Looks like I’m up front row at a concert back in 80s. Lol! This thing ROCKS! Was gonna go for the more portable options, but this unit will stay in my office and rock me thru the tedious days. So glad I decided to go with this. Worth every penny. Should have done it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: An excellent combination of great sound that can be played loud. The sound fills the room, and being a child of the 70s that is important! This is the first bluetooth speaker I have found where you can turn it up enough to enjoy that music being around you, even when it is coming from a different room. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Finnigan

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE MY SPEAKER
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker. I had a JBL bluetooth and wanted something bigger. I'm very happy I looked outside JBL. This speaker has a full sound and fills the room. You do not need to crank it, its that good. As far as sound goes its beautiful. The only downside is the blue tooth can be finicky and you can only run one speaker at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker sounds SO GOOD! I’m a musician so I hear music very differently than most people and this speaker passes the test. It has so much depth to it. I would definitely recommend if you’re looking for a speaker to fill the room with good sound. My only issue is the Bluetooth connection. You have to reconnect every time you want to switch from different players, which is annoying but it’s super easy to pair so I guess its worth it. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Big sound , little size
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the best portable speaker I have purchased ... sounds as good as my home system... with Bluetooth, more convenient....has good highs and very good lows... much better than the smaller Marshall which is also very good...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dead on arrival.
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t work out of the box. Waited almost a month for it to arrive even tho it was a prime item. Finally get it and it doesn’t turn on at all. Not having to wait another week to get a replacement... about to cancel my “prime” membership
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S.

customer_reviews.title: BEST HI-FI EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Love. Love. Love. It lives up to its "Big Brother's" reputation. (I'm a musician and have had a Marshall "Blues Breaker" -- Eric Clapton -- guitar amp for many moons. The ads for this highlight that it's Loud. It's loud alright, but I learned many, many moons ago that wattage/loudness gives you something known as "Headroom". I won't get into the technicalities of that. What it boils down to is that no matter what volume you play it at, it gives you the same sonic characteristics as playing it really loud. But when you play it loud -- look out! There goes the brain!
customer_reviews.author: Bongo Ball

customer_reviews.title: This is a terrific Marshall unit and I strongly recommend it to you ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching over the last few years trying to find that missing sound from my past. I have owned many high end Bluetooth and Wi-fi units (Bose, Blue 1), but so far unimpressed until now! This is a Terrific MARSHALL SPEAKER SYSTEM and I strongly recommend it to all you folks still looking for that missing sound! Update: Thanks to Frank S. for providing this Review from Yahoo.
customer_reviews.author: Delneil

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal speaker!
customer_reviews.text: They should rename this speaker "the noise complaint" because it is LOUD! I haven't had the balls to take it past half volume for fear my neighbors will come knocking on my door to tell me to turn it down. In addition to insane volume, this speaker has wonderful clairity and deep, undistorted bass. With the inclusion of aptX bluetooth, my lossless audio files sound just as good as if I plugged the speaker in to my computer. If you are looking for a high quality, phenomenal sounding speaker, look no further... just warn your neighbors before cranking it to 11!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: You should buy this!!! You want this!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing rocks!!! Sounds awesome. Great for a house party. Bluetooth goes about 70 feet away before it starts breaking up on connection. Definitely would recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas D.

customer_reviews.title: Only improvements I would like is it would be nice to have carry handles ...
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable quality loud blutooth. Friend is a drummer In a band and was VERY impressed with the soumd! Only improvements I would like is it would be nice to have carry handles on the side and to have it possible to hook up 2 of these speakers to play at the same time via blutooth like some of the other companies offer with their speakers. Super quality with the nice old nostalgic look!
customer_reviews.author: anton

customer_reviews.title: Completely unreliable connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mistaking it for the wireless version, Bluetooth connectivity was unreliable, using it meant having to reset it and hope whichever device I wanted to use it with would connect. It rarely did. The sound was very good when I was able to get it to pair. I went with the Audio Pro c5 and matching sub for the same price. The audio pro is simply put- in a whole ‘nuther league. In every way. Far superior sound and reliable connectivity. Cannot suggest the Woburn to anyone 😟
customer_reviews.author: Ken Pittman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speaker
customer_reviews.text: The sound is comparable if not richer than sonos and bose- why I prefer it is because it doesn't have the smart voice features like alexa etc. Much prefer my technology to not spy on my life.
customer_reviews.author: Yayasisterhood

customer_reviews.title: What a great speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Jesoos Christo!!! What a great speaker!!! Clarity and depth are all I have to say. My old floor speakers are on the curb Monday. I have Tivoli and Sangean radios so listening in Mono is not a problem, even though this is a stereo amp face on, it just sounds great!!! Like other reviews state bluetooth is spotty, screw it, use a cable and just rock on. I don't turn up over 4 [wish it went to 11] it's LOUD, pricey, yes, but clears up space for many things. As a Seasoned Citizen who has play through Marshall Amps, this is as good as a home speaker gets.....
customer_reviews.author: David T. Kearns

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speaker! Hooked it up directly to our Mac ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome speaker! Hooked it up directly to our Mac computer. Only complaint is I can't seem to get the bluetooth sync'd as the bluetooth light won't stay on when selected. The troubleshooting book advised that there may be some appliance interference... Although, I'm not too worried as I didn't buy it for the bluetooth capabilities. I can't turn the volume higher than half way without the entire family yelling at me to turn it down! Sounds great and looks retro cool too.
customer_reviews.author: Neel J.

customer_reviews.title: Muddy, Loud, when it connected
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to replace a bose sound link iii, the only thing the Marshall speaker was very loud with muddy sound and poor bluetooth range. The bose sounded way better with rock solid performance for a couple of years and still works. What I found better was a pair of wifi Sonos, better sound than bose.
customer_reviews.author: Jalebi

customer_reviews.title: Feel the Thunder!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for a fair price. The bluetooth element is awesome. We use it to select songs to play drums and guitar too. We're very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: PastorMichael

customer_reviews.title: Muffled Sound
customer_reviews.text: I am not very impressed with the sound. It's feels too uncontrolled, heavier on the bass. I prefer more neutral, tighter representation. Don't care much for the looks either.
customer_reviews.author: Pankaj Gupta

customer_reviews.title: No access to Marshall phone app!
customer_reviews.text: Beware! The Woburn will NOT allow you to use the Marshall phone app. It's an older model of the speaker. Why is this a big deal? You can't adjust the volume through your phone. To me, that's a big issuee. Call me spoiled but, walking across the room to adjust volume is like turning the dial on a black and white TV and eating a bad meal wrapped in aluminum foil. I'm sending this back and have ordered the Woburn II.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Yee

customer_reviews.title: Sounds amazing, looks great (retro) and if you grew up with Marshall amps this is a must.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds amazing, looks great (retro) and if you grew up with Marshall amps this is a must. For this price you can get a variety of Bose speakers some JBL some harman but this one blows them all out of the water. Its bigger than the rest but sounds amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Izak K.

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love this
customer_reviews.text: Sounded great at first. Had to return due to defect.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew B. Newman

customer_reviews.title: Deep and crisp sound quality where you can distinguish each musical and vocal sound
customer_reviews.text: This is the best semi-portable USB speaker that money could buy PERIOD. This thing filled a whole outdoor wedding venue that fits 150 people from the background music, ceremony, cocktail hour, speeches and eventually to the dance party. Its the best thing I have purchased in recent memory and the sound quality was superb. Mainly because of its size and shape, it sounds more like a very deep mono speaker - lots of depth. You can definitely distinguish each instrument and vocal sound. I highly recommend buying this if you have the resources.
customer_reviews.author: Arctic

customer_reviews.title: What a sound!
customer_reviews.text: This Marshal speaker kicks a great sound on anytime of music genre! The bass and tremble are deep and clear. Man, I got my moneys worth on this product You definitely will not be sorry purchasing this dynamic speaker!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos H. Davila Jr.

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT SPEAKER: Plug in is great.  No hassle
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy I purchased this speaker. The sound is great. I like the old style look and its plug in. No need to deal with batteries, charging etc. I am using this for my home office and its beautiful to look at and the size of the speaker generates great sound that fills the room.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound.  Worth the price IMO.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Great sound. Have a smaller Sony XB40 and although it's nice, the sound is no comparison to this speaker. Use bluetooth mostly and the manual volume knob makes it very easy to get the volume boost which is often difficult with most bluetooth setups.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Gearheard

customer_reviews.title: It's better than any Bluetooth I've ever heard
customer_reviews.text: I bought because of the reviews! It's better than any Bluetooth I've ever heard! Has Phonograph input!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wow is this this loud!!!
customer_reviews.text: Only have had it for a few days, but wow, what great sound. Little to no distortion at higher volumes. Can finally hear what those small BlueTooth speakers can't deliver Simple, easy to use, great quality at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: gdesmet

customer_reviews.title: It's a Marshall, what else can I say?
customer_reviews.text: It's a Marshall, what else can I say? It's presence and hard hitting power solidly projects the rock music feel of an era gone by. If you're looking for a transportable unit, you will find nothing better than the Marshall Woburn.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: It's simply amazing. I've heard them all
customer_reviews.text: If you're hesitating whether to buy the Woburn...DO IT! DO IT NOW! It's simply amazing. I've heard them all, this is the best sound and construction of them all. Marshall is on a planet all their own...PLANET ROCK! Top shelf Marshall, great work!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Rocks
customer_reviews.text: I turn it up and don't even care if my neighborhood likes my taste in music. Haven't received notice from HOA yet, but it's probably coming.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The bass and treble control are great. I use my iPad mini4 with the 3
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is outstanding. It is very loud and clear, with deep wall shaking bass. The bass and treble control are great. I use my iPad mini4 with the 3.5 connector, which seems to be slightly better than the bluetooth. Using Spotify and the streaming settings on "extreme" the speaker is great.
customer_reviews.author: GRASLI

customer_reviews.title: What a great speaker.
customer_reviews.text: This Bluetooth speaker is amazing, best Bluetooth speaker I have heard hands down. Marshall really did there homework and made a excellent product. I gave this speaker 5 stars wish I could give it 15. Go grab this Bluetooth this product will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Irving

customer_reviews.title: A good buy !
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great, I couldn't believe it !, I carry it any where I go. I used it for a house party and my guests were amazed at the sound production. An excellent buy, will recommend it any day.
customer_reviews.author: Kollinxo

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal!!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is great!! Not disappointed at by any means. Dont get upset about portability obviously because of its size that should be common sense. But the sound quality is incredible. I have not had a speaker of this quality yet. Thank you #marshall!!
customer_reviews.author: Walter kovacs

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Excellent Sound
customer_reviews.text: I used to be a Bose advocate, until I bought this thing. The sound is superb. The bluetooth connection has no detectable latency. Sorry Bose, you've been bested.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn101

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to spend over $400 on a bluetooth speaker, but I am so glad I did with the Marshall Woburn. It's easy to use, and the sound that comes out of this thing is amazing. If you buy this, you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Nice bass for a small box.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a teenager who absolutely loves it. It should carry him through college and beyond, if he takes care of it. This far, it’s the one thing he does keep clean in his room.
customer_reviews.author: Skredberry

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound - zero regrets
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I am quite impressed. The Woburn has a very rich sound and volume to spare. Listening to classical or rock the rich tones and wonderful sound are just fantastic. I couldn't recommend more.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Loud Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker. But needs to be overpacked for shipment. Shipped in Marshall box only.
customer_reviews.author: Axe Rider

customer_reviews.title: This speaker is amazing and I'm somewhat of a speaker snob
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is amazing and I'm somewhat of a speaker snob. It looks as great as it sounds and is the centerpiece of my entertainment center. BUYER BEWARE - this is the LOUDEST bluetooth speaker you will ever hear. Your neighbor's floor will shake if you dare play this speaker full blast. Overall, the best speaker I've ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound - Bluetooth sucks
customer_reviews.text: Literally blown away by the sound, but you can not move your Bluetooth source more than 1ft away from the speaker. B&O speakers cover a range of 15ft and more. If you can live with that - just wow. Though if you put your iPhone sound on max, the speaker will tremble, but no amplifier to blow up 🙃
customer_reviews.author: Peter Paul

customer_reviews.title: Love at first sound!
customer_reviews.text: You have to hear it to believe it. The bass is fantastic. The sound is warm. The analog controls are great.
customer_reviews.author: Alex R.

customer_reviews.title: There is no better Bluetooth speaker in this price point.
customer_reviews.text: Simply put the Woburn rocks! There is no better plug-in only Bluetooth speaker on the market. Believe me I have looked. I’m a nut that way.
customer_reviews.author: VONZIPPER

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound (and look)
customer_reviews.text: The sound coming out of this thing is fantastic. I read some folks saying it dies after a year, so I bought the SquareTrade 4-year extended warranty for $15. Hope it works out.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Hart

customer_reviews.title: Quality speaker with great sound!!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is awesome. I have a variety of sound equipment for different forms of sources. I use this primarily for Bluetooth. Most of the time in the woods on the deck of my pole barn. The sound is great. The speaker is high quality and durable. This was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Suwannee

customer_reviews.title: Wow this is an awesome speaker! The bluetooth pickup
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is an awesome speaker! The bluetooth pickup, frequency response, clarity, and volume are outstanding. Whatever you play though this speaker, rock, jazz, classical, is audiophile quality. This puts the smaller bluetooth speaker to shame. Spend a little more and get quality sound.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd A. Doughty

customer_reviews.title: Nice and loud
customer_reviews.text: Aa you all know you cannot go wrong with Marshall, the quality of the sound is nice and is really loud
customer_reviews.author: J-rod

customer_reviews.title: Best Marshall speaker
customer_reviews.text: Best Marshall speaker so far. Got it on sale for $180 and well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Normal quality.
customer_reviews.text: The design is very good, but the sound is not that good as advertised. Plus small defect was found on connector.
customer_reviews.author: John CExpert

customer_reviews.title: Can’t Go Wrong
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Great sound, range and dynamics. Great for patio and outdoor parties. Needs to be plugged into wall.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M.

customer_reviews.title: Simply, the best!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a speaker! I am thrilled with the clear, crisp sound it produces. I actually first saw/heard it about a year ago. I was at my son's apartment complex in the party room and someone had their smartphone connected to it and I just kept looking at this speaker with its incredible sound. I did not write down the name of it, but I started thinking about buying a speaker a year later. The only thing I remembered was that the name on the speaker began with "M", so it took awhile before it came to me. I am enjoying it thoroughly, playing CDs from 20-25 yrs ago on my boombox. Amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr B

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT speaker. Sound is clear
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT speaker. Sound is clear. Bass is impressive for the size. Volume will rock you out of the room. Packaging and fit/finish is excellent and leaves this as a show piece almost. I’d highly suggest this speaker!
customer_reviews.author: Brad Walden

customer_reviews.title: buy as many as you can. put one in ...
customer_reviews.text: buy as many as you can. put one in each room, 2 for outdoor patio setup, 3 for your garage. no direct remote outside of your sound source but such a petty inconvenience. if it's too difficult to get up and set a knob every 20 mins or so, you're too soft for this life.
customer_reviews.author: jason e kerr

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Crisp and monstrously loud. Can fill a small auditorium if the acoustics are good.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: The sound is fantastic. I purchased smaller the smaller version of the ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound is fantastic. I purchased smaller the smaller version of the Marshall speaker line and wasn't happy with the sound quality, especially the base. So I returned it and purchased this model. It sounds great. However the Bluetooth is a major pain. It is often very difficult to pair or sync with my iPhone 6s - especially if my phone was recently using another blue tooth device like headphones or some other speakers. This is a major pain. I often have to even remove the Marshall completely from my phone and the re-pair it get it to work. Otherwise I would give this five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Yearley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: The best. Buy it now. Don't think about it. Just do it. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Very loud
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what can you say, this speaker rocks. Don’t go past 6 volume even out side.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff W.

customer_reviews.title: Kicks ass and takes names
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast----in a good way! If you turn it up past 3 you may get the police at your front door. The sound is clear and the build quality is awesome. I don't know if it's worth $600, but it's definitely the best home audio product I've ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: jmua04

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this speaker! I've had a few Marshall speakers before so I knew this would be amazing and yet I was still blown away how great it is!
customer_reviews.author: Wade hagstrom

customer_reviews.title: Power just went off...
customer_reviews.text: The power went off... I have done the trouble-shooting, but no power until now...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Speaker is pricey but the quality of Marshall is exactly what you are getting. Quick delivery, easy setup and a speaker that blows away 2 Kenwood speakers away
customer_reviews.author: jay hay

customer_reviews.title: Amazing full sound and LOUD as you want
customer_reviews.text: Use this in my garage...Amazing full sound, great Bass. Will get very loud with no distortion. I use the Aux cord that comes with the speaker to play music from my IPod and Android devices. The Bluetooth works great, but in my situation I don't push the range very much so can't really speak to BT capability.... This speaker might be pricey but the sound is dollar for dollar definitely worth it...
customer_reviews.author: M. Neiner

customer_reviews.title: This speaker means business.
customer_reviews.text: Straight outta the box I was very impressed with the quality of this speaker. This thing is loud and even at louder levels the sound is clear. The only reason this lost a star is because of the blue tooth connectivity. Every now and then it drops the signal. Even when next to my computer. Overall this speaker makes up for it in sound. Little bit on the pricey side but it's worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Anya Habet

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the original Marshall Woburn and some how ended up getting the Marshall Woburn II. This is still a awesome speaker and although it’s the more expensive and not newer version I honestly would have rather gotten the original model.
customer_reviews.author: Chia

customer_reviews.title: Blown away, like that Maxell guy...
customer_reviews.text: F-ing amazing. Forgive the vulgarity but this piece of equipment is sublime. It fills the room with sound and not with volume. The sound is clear and thick, you hear everything easily. Not tinny. Unless you're listening to someone knocking tin...
customer_reviews.author: David Hallowes

customer_reviews.title: Stop shopping and buy now!!
customer_reviews.text: Best speaker I’ve ever had! Crystal clear sound. Plenty of bass!! Loud loud loud!!!! Exactly what everyone needs to rock out! Fills the whole room like your at a concert. Bring the Marshall outside and fill the whole backyard! Great speaker for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Gray

customer_reviews.title: HOLY CRAP I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is AMAZING. The rumbling bass combined with the smooth sound of the tweeters made this speaker a 5 star product. If you have the money and are looking to buy a speaker don’t hesitate for this one, you will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Brennan P

customer_reviews.title: enjoying music again
customer_reviews.text: Have I never had good speakers..... apparently not....not that I didn't try too. These speakers fill my rooms with every note ever played. So beautiful. I look forward to listening to MUSIC again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Petrie

customer_reviews.title: Looking for the right wireless speaker, this is it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love!! and the sound is amazing and the way it blends with the bass just the perfect speaker and is very loud have to say. The price is right and is worth getting.

customer_reviews.title: The Best !!
customer_reviews.text: Blows away the competition !! tried 5 top of the line models and the sound quality was amazing !!

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker sound and classic design
customer_reviews.text: Exceeds expectations for sound quality! So much more bass than expected from small speaker. Also, able to stay clear at pretty high volume....

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal Sound
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for excellent sound quality..this is the speaker! Cool aesthetic! It is bulky and not the most convenient to move around, but well worth the sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: sskeil

customer_reviews.title: Great look and sound!
customer_reviews.text: Looks cool and sounds great! Perfect with our blue tooth turntable or playing music from our phone. Nice solid speaker. My only regret is not buying this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy E

customer_reviews.title: Why no return after delivered
customer_reviews.text: Didnt work at all. Frustrated item was returned by UPS by my expense postage.. Item delivered 3 pm But no return to D.Card purchased by? Ret USCG B.Loomis
customer_reviews.author: Brian Loomis

customer_reviews.title: I love the clarity that this speaker delivers at higher volumes
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a flexible, somewhat-portable speaker for over two years. I have stopped looking. I love the clarity that this speaker delivers at higher volumes. I have tried a number of well-known brands and speakers in this price range, but this is the one I will keep.
customer_reviews.author: Reid W. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: SOUND AND CLARITY
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of the best Boombox I have ever owned. Loud, clear, bass and clarity are superb. Highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: M.M.T

customer_reviews.title: Just awesome
customer_reviews.text: Incredible sound. Like nothing I have ever heard. Expensive but worth every penny. If you like music loud and clear. This is the one.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing speaker very loud and crisp!! Worth the money !
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: And the overall sound quality is excellent. It wasn't cheap but it was worth every ...
customer_reviews.text: This is Big Audio Dynamite! It is LOUD. I have yet to push the volume past 5 and it still manages to shake the walls and floor. And the overall sound quality is excellent. It wasn't cheap but it was worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: DWW

customer_reviews.title: THE best
customer_reviews.text: The best. Period. Loud, crisp, bass is rich... looks great. Want 20 of them.
customer_reviews.author: cs

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker has not disappointed! It's super easy to pair and the sound is amazing. We've had so many people comment on how loud it is and how retro cool it looks! No regrets here what-so-ever!
customer_reviews.author: Lori McGregor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Speaker!!!
customer_reviews.text: The is the best speaker ever. Great sound quality and range in highs and lows. Excellent bass!!! I have several other Marshall speakers and this is my favorite. I fills a room or outside area more than adequately. Excellent quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon D. Brackett

customer_reviews.title: Very crisp and loud
customer_reviews.text: It's not often that I buy something and am blown away by it. This speaker is loud. Very loud. The sound is crisp and free of distortion. Did I mention that it is loud.
customer_reviews.author: james

product_meta.title: Marshall Woburn Bluetooth Speaker, Black (4090963) (04090963)
product_meta.description: When it comes to sound quality, the Woburn spares no expense. It's designed with loud in mind. and you'll quickly hear by its performance that it holds true to the Marshall name. This loudspeaker hits high trebles cleanly, handles low bass with ease and has a clear, lifelike mid range. The analog treble, bass and volume knobs give you custom control of your sound. With unique sound design and quality components, it's made to deliver accurate response throughout the frequency range. The Woburn is literally built to thrill. The Woburn features a classic Marshall design, with a vintage-looking front fret, gold-colored metal details, and that iconic script logo. With its script logo, black vinyl casing and vintage-inspired fret grille cloth, the Woburn is an instant rock 'n' roll classic. The Woburn is larger than life with loud in mind! The Woburn is all about modern listening capability. That's why we added the option of connecting digitally via an optical cable. Hook your Woburn up to your TV, Apple TV, Airport express, hard disk player, streaming play, and satellite or cable receiver. Optical works with PCM stereo only. Some of your music knew a time before Bluetooth. That's why the Woburn enables you to go analog and connect to those devices that may be collecting dust in your basement. So come on! Dust off your CD player or turntable (with RIAA) and connect via the RCA input. This input can also be used with your Sonos unit. Inspired by the golden days of rock 'n' roll, this coiled double-ended stereo cable with two 3.5mm plugs is a modern take on the classic telephone guitar cord guitar cable. Kink-free and extendable, it's your music device's connection to a world of great sound. Frequency Required 50/60 Hz
feature_bullets: Portable Bluetooth player with 90W output. Maximum sound pressure level 110 dB at 1 m
Multi input for Bluetooth, RCA or Optical. Pair with virtually any Bluetooth-enabled device.
Classic Marshall design details. Connect to CD player and turntables.
Power amplifiers:One 50 Watt Class D amplifier for the woofer and Two 20 Watt Class D amplifiers for the tweeters
Wireless connectivity:Bluetooth v4.0 aptX.Driver Diameter 1 m, 5.25 m. Driver Diameter (metric) 133 mm, 25 mm
